page_content: The page discusses the Canton of Bern's digital strategy, including the use of open-source software.
The page discusses a pilot project involving the use of the 'Logib' software to ensure gender pay equality in procurement processes.
The page discusses the ownership strategy of Bedag Informatik AG, including its software development sector.
The page discusses a 26 million CHF credit for the second phase of an Enterprise Resource Planning System (ERP) using SAP software.
The page provides a guide on how to submit cultural offers for schools in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides information on apprenticeships in various fields including Informatik (Information Technology) at the Kantonspolizei Bern.
The page provides guidelines and work aids for community representatives and specialists in the fields of engineering and geology, focusing on natural hazards.
The page discusses the Canton of Bern's initiative to promote open-source software, allowing departments to offer their applications as 'Open Source' on GitHub.
The page provides legal disclaimers and data protection information for the website.

The page discusses various topics including the appointment of a new head for the Office for Informatics and Organization (KAIO) and the approval of a credit for a new tax assessment system for withholding tax.
